document_data.name: Efreeti palazzo
document_data.location: [[City of Brass]], the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]]
document_data.source: [[Secrets of the Lamp|Secrets of the Lamp (Genie Lore)]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Efreeti palazzos''' were the homes of [[noble efreeti]] and their slaves. These buildings served as both a palace and stronghold.
document_data.Location: Most efreeti palazzos were located within the [[City of Brass]] on the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The household of an efreeti palazzo contained the ruling noble efreeti, common [[efreet]], [[jann]] and other slaves. Often a stable was also present which housed [[nightmares]], [[hell hound]]s, and [[Fire Falcon|fire falcons]].
